Button Variants

Use any of the available button classes to quickly create a styled button.

Primary action
Secondary action
Link style
Button States

Each button includes styles for hover, active and disabled states.

Primary disabled
Secondary disabled
Link disabled
Button Sizes

Large and small size options are available to use. A large button works well for a prominent call to action, while small buttons are suited for use inside a table where space is limited. Block-level buttons are full-width and can be combined with small or large button styles.

Large
Small
Full-width
Long label
